title: Betsy's Wrath
summaries: Betsy's Wrath is a Hardmode, post-Golem magic weapon that shoots three fireballs that travel in arcs through the air, exploding upon impact with an enemy or solid block and inflicting the Betsy's Curse debuff, which adds 40 armor penetration against affected entities for 10 seconds. The Betsy's Curse debuff cannot be applied to other players. Betsy's Wrath has a 1/4 (25%) chance of being dropped by Betsy during Tier 3 of the Old One's Army event.

statistics.Sell: 5 GC
